about_the_game: The Imp of the Sun: Official Soundtrack is composed by Jose Varon and features 17 tracks. Relive your adventure with Nin and immerse yourself in melodies utilising various Andean and Peruvian instruments, some of which are over 6000 years old and never heard in modern recordings until now!
detailed_description: The Imp of the Sun: Official Soundtrack is composed by Jose Varon and features 17 tracks. Relive your adventure with Nin and immerse yourself in melodies utilising various Andean and Peruvian instruments, some of which are over 6000 years old and never heard in modern recordings until now!

short_description: Imp of the Sun's music features an incredible lineup of talent including Sandro Freidrich (Horizon Zero Dawn: Frozen Wilds), Kristin Naigus (Ori and The Will of The Wisps, Hades), Uyanga Bold (Ghost of Tsushima, League of Legends)
